# Explanation Template

Intro: Briefly introduce the concept or system and why it matters.

## What is <Concept>?

Provide a high‑level overview in a few sentences. Keep it precise and free of marketing language.

## Key components

1. Component A — Role, inputs/outputs, interactions
2. Component B — Role, inputs/outputs, interactions

Simple text diagram (optional):

```
Client -> [API] -> [Processor] -> [Store]
```

Explain the diagram in surrounding text.

## Workflow example

Walk through a concrete scenario step by step, linking the components above.

## Design rationale

Call out the trade‑offs and why this approach was chosen.

## Further reading

- Link to design decisions
- Link to how‑to or tutorials
